name: FreeMusicDiscoverGreatSongsbyGenre
0:
”Alexa, Play Free Music”
”Alexa, Start Free Music”
”Alexa, Open Free Music”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: free music
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Free Music will let you discover great songs!

SIMPLE STEPS:
As soon as you enable the skill, you can easily enjoy great music:
1. Start Free Music skill: "Alexa, Play Free Music" or "Alexa, Start Free Music" or "Alexa, Open Free Music"
2. Choose one of the top 15 genres: Pop, Country, Hip-Hop, Dance, Electronic, Reggae, Latin, Soul, Jazz, Ambient, Blues, Relax, Ambient, Chill, Trap.
3. We immediately play a selection of great songs from the genre you have selected.

ADVANCED FEATURES:
1. Once you get used to the skill and know what music you would like to listen to, you can directly ask Free Music for a specific genre in order to play:
=> "Alexa, ask Free Music to play Pop Music" or "Alexa, ask Free Music to play Hip-Hop Music" 
2. To pause the Music, you can say "Alexa, Pause" or "Alexa, Stop"
3. To play again, you can say "Alexa, Resume" or "Alexa, Continue"

It's free, unlimited and with great music!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
